code: public void forward(HttpTunnelPayload payload) throws IOException {     synchronized (this.monitor) {         long seq = payload.getSequence().         if (this.lastRequestSeq != seq - 1) {             Assert.state(this.queue.size() < MAXIMUM_QUEUE_SIZE, "Too many messages queued").             this.queue.put(seq, payload).             return.         }         payload.logOutgoing().         payload.writeTo(this.targetChannel).         this.lastRequestSeq = seq.         HttpTunnelPayload queuedItem = this.queue.get(seq + 1).         if (queuedItem != null) {             forward(queuedItem).         }     } }
